item.title: Contact
item.description: Best way to reach me is at tiago at 3coresec.com.

item.title: AWS Guardduty vs IDS
item.description: I recently came across an AWS Blog post titled New third-party test compares Amazon GuardDuty to network intrusion detection systems where the author links to a white paper written by, as the title suggest, a third party. The intent of their article is to provide an unbiased analyses of the capabilities of AWS GuardDuty when compared with “other” network intrusion detection systems. I do not, however, believe this objective was reached, and I want to highlight a few points about it in this blog post.

item.title: Dualcomm ETAP 2003
item.description: The Dualcomm ETAP-2003 is a pretty nifty little device. Because I couldn’t find any images of them before I purchased mine, I thought I’d share a few photos I took:
